definition: make complex or intricate or complicated
details:
verb
- make complex or intricate or complicated
= example: make complex or intricate or complicated
- occupy or engage the interest of
= example: occupy or engage the interest of
- require as useful, just, or proper
= synonyms: need
- contain as a part
= example: contain as a part
- have as a necessary feature
= example: have as a necessary feature
= synonyms: imply
- connect closely and often incriminatingly
= synonyms: regard
- engage as a participant
= example: engage as a participant
